info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 1:21PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light snow mostly Thursday afternoon and evening... Scattered light snow showers will be possible over far Southwest MT through Thursday morning. However a period of heavier and steady snowfall is expected Thursday afternoon and evening. Snow accumulations of around an inch or two are likely during this period. The most favored areas of the steady snow to occur will be around Big Sky, West Yellowstone, Raynolds Pass and Monida Pass. Those traveling in this region Thursday afternoon into Thursday evening should be alert for areas of reduced visibility and changing road conditions.
